body: @lbargaoanu I have created a minimal [repro](https://gist.github.com/KuraiAndras/e0cdc441706501452ef7fd9044a33382). It seems like calling ReverseMap is the culprit, without it don't get an exception.
I'm sure there are many workarounds. You can use a `Func` based `MapFrom` or simply `new Guid()`.

Changing the mapping to the following fixed the problem:
```csharp
CreateMap<AddChannel, ChannelDto>()
    .ForMember(
        src => src.Id,
        opt => opt.MapFrom((_, __, ___) => Guid.Empty))
    .ReverseMap();
```
Thanks @lbargaoanu for the help

rename.to: Static field requires null instance, non-static field requires non-null instance

body: If you'd rather keep your original mapping, you can use the [MyGet](https://docs.automapper.org/en/latest/The-MyGet-build.html) build.
Should we keep this open until the other branch is merged?
The fix is in the MyGet build, so I don't see the need.
But if you think people will hit the issue and keeping it open will help them, sure. I'm thinking people will find it with google regardless, but maybe not :)
More thinking that an issue is "fixed" when merged - was this fixed in a branch or in `master`?
It's fixed in the branch of the PR, but that's the latest from MyGet, so merging into master doesn't seem relevant.

issue.title: MapFrom string.Empty with ReverseMap
issue.body:
<!-- 

   If you're new to AutoMapper, please ask a question on StackOverflow first and come back here if the people there consider it a bug.
   If you've just upgraded to 10.0, please read the upgrade guide first (https://docs.automapper.org/en/latest/10.0-Upgrade-Guide.html).
   Try the [MyGet](https://docs.automapper.org/en/latest/The-MyGet-build.html) build.
   Try to provide [a minimal, complete, and verifiable example](https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve), preferably a [gist](https://gist.github.com/lbargaoanu/9c7233441c3a3413cc2b9b9ebb5964a9) that we can execute and see fail. [Here](https://gist.github.com/lbargaoanu/0cbc531306223f7ffc5468becf2642d6) is an example for ProjectTo.
   For feature requests, just clear out the below.
-->

### Source/destination types

```csharp
  public class Foo
  {
    public string Name { get; set; }
  }

  public class FooDto
  {
    public string Name { get; set; }
    public string Blank { get; set; }
  }
```

### Mapping configuration

```csharp
      var configuration = new MapperConfiguration(cfg =>
      {
        cfg.CreateMap<Foo, FooDto>()
          .ForMember(d => d.Blank, o => o.MapFrom(s => string.Empty))
        .ReverseMap();
      });
```

### Version: 10.1.1

### Expected behavior

Mapper configuration should be valid. This works with version 10.0.0

### Actual behavior

Fails with an exception:
Static field requires null instance, non-static field requires non-null instance. (Parameter 'expression')

### Steps to reproduce

```csharp
Compile and run code
```

body: This issue has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
